summary: Donald Trump claimed at a debate in Nashville on March 15th, 2017 that the ruling on immigration makes the US look weak, but he believes the country is no longer weak. He stated that they will fight the ruling and take the case to the Supreme Court if necessary, with the goal of winning and keeping citizens safe.

Donald Trump claimed at the Trump Nashville event on March 15th, 2017 that he will enforce trade rules, bring back jobs to the US, support law enforcement, protect freedoms, defend the Second Amendment, and restore respect for the country and its flag.

Donald Trump, during a debate in Nashville on March 15th, 2017, claimed that if a company decides to leave America, lay off its workers, and then import its products back into the country, there will be consequences. He emphasized the importance of strong borders in preventing such actions.
